overview: A poor but talented little drummer boy seeks to win the friendship of the pretty girl he knows from the playground.  Loaded with humanity, pageantry, sentiment and laugh-out-loud humor, Christmas Dreams is wordlessly told through color, movement and dance. A talented little Drummer Boy seeks to win the friendship of the Pretty Girl from the playground. He dreams an enchanted Christmastime world that fantastically the Pretty Girl shares.
title: Christmas Dreams
